### Simulation constants

Sample sizes

```{r sample-size}
n_values <- c(30, 60, 90, 300, 600, 900, 3000, 6000, 9000)
n_values

```
Candidate predictor variables
```{r predictive-variables}
predictors <- c(12, 18, 24)
predictors

```

from $\rho_{X_{i}X_{j}}$

```{r correlation}
rho_values <- c(0, sqrt(0.4), sqrt(0.8))
rho_values

```
$\alpha$
```{r alpha}
MFWER <- 0.15

alpha_values <- c(0.15, 1 - (1 - MFWER)^(1 / n_predictors), 0.05)
alpha_values

```
```{r betas}
betas <- c(1, 2, 3, -1, -2, -3)
#betas <- 2
betas

```

```{r reproduce-simulation}
sim_object <- dk_sim(betas, n_values, rho_values, predictors, "backward", rnorm, 
                     0, 0.2)

```
